name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Unity Engineer with 8 years of experience, I leverage my strong skills in **Unity**, **C#**, and game development to create interactive, high-performance live service games. My background in developing robust systems includes expertise with **MonoBehaviours**, **ScriptableObjects**, **Prefabs**, and **Addressables**, ensuring seamless game flow and user experience.
With hands-on experience in **GoLang**, **Redis**, **SQL**, and **Docker**, I implement scalable backend solutions and maintain efficient CI/CD processes. My technical acumen extends to collaborating in cross-functional teams to deliver innovative gaming experiences aligned with player expectations and industry standards. I thrive on integrating agile methodologies and real-time data processing to foster adaptive game environments.
